title: Turn The VOLUME UP!
body_text:
We've made quit the splash in 13 years and these major attendance figures certainly speak volumes, all for a measly, simple game of dodgeball. 40+ actual players? That's pretty cool.
And with August 25 quickly approaching, let it be known: 5 out of the 13 listed have taken place in August. Maybe we can squeeze the 13YA on this list .. who knows!
body_html:
We've made quit the splash in 13 years and these major attendance figures certainly speak volumes, all for a measly, simple game of dodgeball. 40+ actual players? That's pretty cool.

And with August 25 quickly approaching, let it be known: 5 out of the 13 listed have taken place in August. Maybe we can squeeze the 13YA on this list .. who knows!
